title: Interpretation of glass in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of glass in a dream by Ibn Sirin, glass is a solid inorganic material, originally found from sand, usually transparent or translucent, some solid and some not, easy to break, and natural impenetrable materials. It does not carry electricity, but the sun penetrates through it and has been used since ancient times in buildings and laboratories, where the most accurate scientific devices and wired and wireless communications were made. Glass varies in its physical and chemical properties. In this article, we will learn today about the interpretation of glass in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing glass in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing glass in a dream indicates an improvement in the sleeper's life and its transformation for the better if he is satisfied with the appearance of glass in the dream. However, if someone dreams of a cup in a dream and is in a bad psychological state, this is a sign of the fears and problems that he will face in his life. Healthy glass in a dream indicates liberation from sorrows and worries. Interpretation of seeing glass for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is repairing broken pieces of glass, this is a sign that God will comfort her and save her from trouble. Seeing broken glass in a dream for a girl can indicate psychological problems that she suffers from, apart from her inability to face many things in her life, and this vision also shows the inner fracture that this girl feels. Interpretation of seeing a cup for a married woman Seeing broken glass in a married woman's dream indicates the family problems she faces, and sometimes it can indicate a quarrel between her and her husband. However, if a married woman sees in her dream that she is repairing broken windows, this is a sign of her good relationship with her husband And that she will enjoy peace and stability in her life. If the woman is married, divorced or pregnant, and she sees that she is repairing broken crystal in her dream, this is good news that she will get a lot of sustenance and money in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about eating glass for a single woman Drinking glass in a dream indicates fears and problems in the dreamer's life. Sometimes it may indicate that the dreamer will seek many projects that will not benefit him. Sometimes, this vision can indicate that the dreamer will make new friendships, but these friendships carry harm and damage. Interpretation of seeing broken glass The dream of breaking glass indicates problems between spouses or family disputes between brothers. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is breaking the window glass while he is angry, this is a sign that he is going through a bad psychological state, and that he suffers from many disturbances that disturb him in his life. This vision also indicates the weakness of the sleeper and his inability to solve the problems he faces in his life, and these problems are often material. Interpretation of seeing a glass house The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that if the sleeper sees in a dream that his house is made of glass, this is a sign that his house is not fortified and that all his affairs are exposed For people. If the sleeper dreams that he has a glass house and that this house has been demolished, this is a sign of a major problem occurring in

title: The symbol of a carpet in a dream for an unmarried woman

preview.html: Carpets in a dream for a single woman, carpets are one of the fabrics that are made to cover the floor and give it a beautiful appearance. It is also handmade. It has many shapes and types and comes in many colors. Many women want to choose the best for them, and when the dreamer sees the carpet, he is surprised and wants to know its interpretation, and scholars believe that this vision carries many different meanings, and in this article we consider together the most important things said about this dream. Carpets in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees a carpet in a dream, this means that she will get a new request and it can be a job, a residence, or buying something new. If a girl sees a carpet in a dream, this symbolizes that she will soon marry a wealthy man and be happy with him. Also, the dreamer's vision of a carpet in a dream indicates a comfortable life and the bliss that he is happy with because he has achieved some important things that made her reach this. And the dreamer who sees a valuable carpet in a dream indicates that her circumstances will change for the better, and she will rise to the highest positions and earn a lot of money. And seeing the dreamer bending over the carpet means that he has achieved the goals and goals that he dreamed of. And if the dreamer sees that she opens the carpet in a dream to pray, this means that all the goals she dreams of will be achieved and she will reach them. Interpretation of the Dream of Secrets is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, write Only a site about the secrets of interpreting dreams. Search Google and get the correct interpretations. Carpets in a dream for singles by Ibn Sirin If an unmarried girl sees carpets in a dream, this means that she is pure, has good morals, performs all religious duties, and walks on the straight path. When a girl buys carpets in a dream, this symbolizes the lawful money that she will soon receive as a result of her participation in a successful project. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is sitting on a carpet with a group of people, this indicates loyalty to friendship and enjoying a prestigious position in society. If the girl sees that she is placing the carpet in a specific place, this indicates the high status she enjoys and the great good that comes her way. If the dreamer has a carpet and loses it in a dream, this means that he commits many sins and deviations from the straight path. If the dreamer sells the carpet in a dream, this means that she suffers from many problems and obstacles in her life and the emergence of a difficult financial crisis. When the dreamer sees the light and the patched carpet, this indicates that he is leaving the world and approaching his appointment with his Lord. Washing carpets in a dream for a woman Single If a girl sees that she is washing the rug for prayer, this means sincerity in prayer, fulfilling duties, and that she is very close to her Lord. This means that she will get a lot of property and a lot of money in the coming period. The dream means good luck and happiness that she will get. Interpretation of giving a rug in a dream to an unmarried woman If an unmarried girl sees that someone gave her a green rug in a dream, this promises her a lot of sustenance

title: The interpretation of seeing water coming down from the roof of a house in a dream has different interpretations

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing water coming down from the roof of the house in a dream has different interpretations. Seeing water in a dream is a good and promising vision for an easy situation and changing things for the better, but seeing water coming down from the roof of the house may feel that his house or his household is in danger because of this vision, and dream interpretation scholars see This dream is one of the dreams that carries different interpretations depending on the circumstances of the people who see the dream and the details of their real lives. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing water coming down from the roof of a house in a dream with different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the roof of a house in a dream. The dream in which you see the roof has meanings and connotations. a lot. Of course, the interpretation varies depending on the type of roof and the dreamer. If you see a thatched roof or clay bricks in your dream, this is a strong indication that you and your family will face worries, problems and sadness in the near future, God forbid, so be careful. If you see in your dream that water is descending or flowing from the top of the roof, this is good news and a sign However, the problems and crises that you are facing or facing will soon be resolved, God willing. If a person sees in his dream that the roof of the house is collapsing and is about to fall completely or that part of it has fallen, then this is a sign of the death of the owner of the house or house, as some have narrated. . Dreams of interpretation scholars, and God knows best, of course. But if you see in a dream a person falling from the dreamer’s house, this means that there is an enemy lurking, but he fell. Follow more on this topic and the interpretation of a dream about a house roof falling from water from all sides from here. Interpretation of a dream about a roof falling. Interpretation Dreaming of seeing water falling from the roof in a dream: In general, seeing the roof of the house cracked, but water or heavy rain falling from it, for both a married woman and an unmarried girl, this is a strong indication that very positive changes and good news are coming. The arrival of someone who will marry her soon and live with him in absolute comfort. For a married woman, if she sees in her dream that the roof of the house is falling with a lot of water or rain, this is evidence that the married woman is reading the book of God Almighty, which is the Holy Qur’an. He reminds her of God Almighty in this house every day. This dream can be interpreted as a sign of neglecting the duty of zakat imposed by God Almighty so that members of society are equal to each other. A married woman must pay zakat on her behalf and on her children in order to become closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about seeing rain falling from the roof of the house in a dream: Rain is a symbol of the goodness of life, so seeing rain in a dream also indicates that good news from God Almighty and abundant provision is coming. A man sees rain falling In his sleep, he stumbles into some problems, and this means that he will get rid of them and all the crises he was exposed to, and his circumstances will change for the better, God willing. Seeing rain in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will get married soon, but if a man sees rain in his dream while he is sitting, this means that his affairs And his emotional relationship will improve. Seeing rain in a dream could mean that there is a malicious person waiting for the dreamer to harm him financially and morally, so you should

title: Interpretation of climbing stairs in a dream

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of climbing the stairs in a dream so that you know its repercussions in different situations. If you saw in your dream before that you are climbing the stairs, then this dream has different interpretations according to the legal interpretations of the interpretation of the dream. , The ladder is actually the means by which we can reach a certain place, such as a house, in buildings consisting of several floors, but on the other hand, this dream represents achieving success because it indicates climbing or carrying other symbols? We will answer this question by shedding light on Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of climbing stairs in a dream.Interpretation of climbing stairs in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of climbing stairs by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing stairs in a dream indicates recovery from illness in the case of the dreamer’s illness. If the dreamer sees that he is climbing the stairs without... If he feels tired and anxious, this vision indicates success and excellence, whether in study or at work, as well as if he climbs with someone he knows. If he climbs the stairs with difficulty, this dream indicates the difficulties and problems that stand between him and the goals he wants to achieve. In the case of climbing Walking up the stairs accompanied by some people, this vision symbolizes the difficulties he faces in reality. As for descending the stairs, this vision shows the high status he enjoys among his family members. Seeing climbing stairs in a single woman’s dream: If an unmarried woman sees that she is climbing a large ladder, this indicates That she is truly married. Seeing someone climbing stairs in a dream also shows how developed, ambitious, and successful one is in reality, as well as in the case of one dreaming of a small staircase. If you see in a dream that she is climbing the stairs without difficulty or fatigue, this indicates the strength of her character. As for her going down On the stairs, this vision symbolizes that she is exposed to an emotional problem in reality. Interpretation of climbing the stairs in a dream for a married woman: Seeing the dream that you are climbing the stairs easily and without fatigue or hardship, this vision is a symbol of abundant nourishment, success, and success. If a married woman sees that she is climbing the stairs quickly, this dream indicates The stability of her married life and her happiness with her husband. Seeing her climbing the stairs in a dream also indicates that her situation will change for the better and she will achieve what she wants after the difficulties. But if a married woman sees that she is descending the stairs, this dream is long and indicates a specific problem, and the dream may indicate her divorce, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing stairs for a pregnant woman: A dream about climbing stairs for a pregnant woman indicates that childbirth will be facilitated, if she climbs it quickly. In the case of climbing a long staircase in a dream, this dream of a pregnant woman symbolizes the birth of a male child, but in the case of climbing a small staircase, it indicates This dream indicates that she has given birth to a child. And God knows best. To dream of climbing stairs with difficulty indicates the difficulty and complexity of childbirth, and God knows best. We present to you the most important interpretations of a dream of climbing stairs, and it should be noted at the end of the article that all of these interpretations are only interpretations of legal interpretations. It may or may not be achieved. Only He knows the unseen in all circumstances. dreams.

title: Interpretation of seeing a kiss or a kiss in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a kiss or a kiss in a dream in detail by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, or Al-Nabulsi, as the vision differs depending on whether it is on the mouth or on the cheek or from a lover, an unknown person, or a known person, and seeing a kiss varies, and it may indicate love or obtaining money. Or the advice varies according to the dreamer’s condition, whether she is single, married, pregnant, or divorced. What is the interpretation of a dream about a joyful kiss according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing a kiss in a dream indicates love and affection. A kiss in a dream with lust means obtaining money from the woman. Seeing a husband kissing his wife in A dream means friendship, love, and mutual benefit. Seeing a father or mother kissing means advice or taking money. Seeing children kissing on the cheek shows interest, care, and adequacy of materials. See also: Interpretation of seeing something other than a kiss in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about a kiss on the mouth of a single woman? If a girl sees it If an unmarried woman sees that someone kissed her on the mouth without desire, this indicates a benefit or financial sum. If an unmarried woman sees that someone has kissed her lustfully, this indicates that she has received money from a forbidden source. If an unmarried woman sees that a dead person has kissed her on his mouth, this indicates On an inheritance he left for her, or a benefit he obtained for her, or the lineage and marriage of that deceased. See also: Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the mouth in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about a kiss on the cheek for a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees someone kissing her on the cheek, this means that she will get married Someone is against her approval and she may be happy with him later. If a girl sees that someone kissed her on the cheek, this indicates advice and guidance from someone, and if she kisses someone, this means that she will give him money or benefit him. What is the interpretation of a dream about a kiss on the neck for a single woman? Seeing a kiss on the neck from a lover in a dream to an unmarried woman indicates a desire to communicate with this person. If an unmarried woman sees someone kissing her neck, this indicates that she will get money. Seeing a kiss from an unknown person in one dream indicates comfort and psychological peace. Seeing a kiss on the neck in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates lust and desire for sexual intercourse. See also: Interpretation of seeing praying in church in a dream. What is the interpretation of dreaming about a kiss from a known person for a single woman? Seeing a kiss in a dream for an unmarried woman means hearing happy news. If a girl sees that someone is kissing her, this indicates emotional stability. Seeing a kiss from a lover in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the approach of their marriage. See also: Interpretation of seeing a man’s or male’s penis in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream about a kiss from a familiar person for a married woman? If A married woman saw that a familiar or close person kissed her, then this indicates good news, happy circumstances, and comfort after distress. Seeing a kiss in a dream for a married woman indicates thanks and gratitude to that person. If a married woman sees that she is kissing a well-known woman and there is enmity between them, this indicates The evil that it harbors. Dreaming of being kissed by a familiar, married person indicates a friendly and grateful relationship with this person.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a sheep

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a sheep in a dream or dream. A sheep is a male goat and is distinguished by its large size and good meat. Seeing a sheep in a dream can have a good appearance or it can be a warning or warning to the family. The appearance of evil to a pregnant or divorced woman in various meanings, and today through one of the vision sites we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin. Or Ibn Katheer, or Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a sheep in a dream announces a good son to his parents. Seeing a sheep as a gift to a man in his sleep says that she has a male child. Seeing a small sheep in a dream indicates strength, youth, and youth. Seeing a sheep in a dream being slaughteredDeath Fidel Bug Aziz. Interpretation of seeing a sheep in one dream. Seeing a sheep in a dream for a single woman announces her marriage to a man with money. Seeing a sheep in a dream for a single woman indicates that the groom is proposing to her, but she cannot decide. Seeing a black sheep in a dream means that a fleeting romantic relationship will not be completed. title: Interpretation of seeing a dragon in a dream and what it shows

preview.html: Seeing a dragon in a dream, and a dragon, which is a frightening animal and its appearance can cause terror, and seeing it in a dream is one of the frightening visions that indicate strife, trouble, and many misfortunes that haunt the dreamer, causing trouble, anxiety, and fear. And disputes, whether family, marital, or social, and seeing a dragon fleeing is good visions that indicate freedom from problems and temptations and the cessation of pain. In this article, we will explain the interpretation of seeing a dragon in a dream, in my opinion. Interpretation of a dream about a dragon chasing me. Seeing a dragon in a dream is one of the visions that can It frightens the fortuneteller and causes him insomnia and fear for the future, and indicates bad luck, problems and troubles. Whoever sees a dragon in a dream, this is a sign of turmoil and distress, and if he sees a dragon chasing him and following him, this is a vision that shows the seriousness of the misfortunes and sorrows that stand in his way. From the dreamer. It may indicate an evil friend who does not wish good for the monarch. Seeing a dragon in a dream. Seeing a dragon with fire confirms the presence of strife and sadness that haunts the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dragon flying in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a dragon flying from a girl’s frightening and terrifying visions shows the problems and fears that haunt her The dragon also refers to the customs and traditions that you are trying to get rid of and are trying to get rid of. The dragon has fire coming out of its mouth, and this indicates the girl’s anger, fatigue, and suffering. Seeing a dragon in a dream is bad luck for the girl. Interpretation of a dream about a red dragon. Seeing a red dragon in a dream indicates the presence of An evil person is planning machinations, pains and misfortunes. Seeing a dragon in a dream Seeing a red dragon flying in a dream indicates the cessation of stress and pain. A red dragon can indicate that the dreamer will get what he wants, such as finding a prestigious job and achieving success and distinction in his life. Interpretation of a dragon attack in a dream For a married woman, seeing a dragon in a dream. Seeing a dragon attack means marital problems and quarrels. It also suggests a crisis and anguish affecting the viewer and may indicate exposure to illness. Interpretation of seeing a black dragon in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a dragon in a dream: If one sees a black dragon, this indicates many enemies. It also indicates the presence of haters and envy. A girl who sees a black dragon indicates bad luck and faces many difficulties and tribulations. Escaping from a dragon in a dream. Seeing a dragon in a dream and whoever saw a huge dragon attacking him but escaped from it, this is a good thing and indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to temptations. And misfortunes, but he will survive. The dragon that the dreamer is chasing also shows the hostility of the person who wants to harm him. A vision of escaping may indicate getting rid of the enemy. Interpretation of a dream about a white dragon: A white dragon in a dream may indicate a false and hypocritical enemy. And let the white dragon attack me, and if one sees that The dragon attacks him, this portends something bad and he may consider it good. Seeing a dragon in a dream A dragon attack may indicate a disease affecting the dreamer. Interpretation of a dragon attack in a dream A dragon attack in a dream indicates the dominance of a great figure over the dreamer, such as a president, a minister, or a person in a high position over the dream. the

title: Interpretation of killing in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the interpretation of killing in a dream by Ibn Sirin, which is a dream that many people have repeatedly. Sometimes a person finds himself a murderer and sometimes he is killed unjustly, because we made the Sultan his heir). The prohibition of killing was not only in the Islamic religion, but this prohibition was mentioned in all heavenly religions, and killing is a crime punishable by law in all countries of the world. Killing occurs in front of him through an encyclopedia. Interpretation of killing in a dream by Ibn Sirin According to what the scholar Ibn Sirin said in the interpretation of killing in a dream, we monitor the following: Seeing the dreamer himself killing a man and blood flowing from him is evidence of an amount of money that the dreamer will receive from the murdered person or a benefit, but in the event that the blood does not flow, this is an indication that this benefit will not be achieved. Killing a person by the neck indicates backbiting and gossip committed by the fortune teller against him. If the murdered person in the dream is known to the dreamer, this may be a sign of the distress and anger that the dreamer feels towards him in reality. Anyone who sees himself being killed repeatedly in a dream, this may be a sign of what he suffers from regret and depression in his life. Withdrawal from life and the desire to die for oneself or get rid of someone involved in his family or professional life. Interpretation of dreams for witnesses to the murder of an unmarried woman In the following points, we take into account the interpretation of the single woman who witnessed the murder: The single woman’s vision of the murder occurring in front of her indicates the failure she faces in her practical and emotional life, and at other times it may indicate To that she overcame difficulties and achieved success. Sometimes, a single woman who sees murder in her dream can be a sign that her marriage is imminent. Interpretation of murder in a dream for a single woman The following is the interpretation of a woman seeing herself during murder: Killing a single woman in a dream indicates her repentance from sin, as God Almighty says in Surat Al-Baqarah, verse 54 (So repent to the Creator and kill yourselves). Killing one person and blood flowing from him indicates a livelihood on the way to him. If he kills a familiar person in a dream, it may mean that he wronged him and slandered him in reality. Killing in a dream with a bullet Killing with a bullet in a dream has many interpretations, which we mention as follows: Killing in a dream sometimes indicates achieving success and hitting goals. Success in killing in a dream is success in real life, and failure to kill in it also symbolizes failure in it. Killing a person the fortuneteller does not know means victory over enemies and defeating them. If a married woman sees herself killed, this is evidence of her fear for her marital life. Shooting a family member symbolizes disintegration And the strife and severing of family ties that this family suffers from. Interpretation of murder in a dream with a murder weapon The interpretation of murder in a dream differs according to the murder weapon used, as follows: Murder with a pistol or rifle is a heated argument between friends or a divorce between spouses. Murder with a knife indicates shocking feelings and sensations. The rope as a murder weapon in a dream symbolizes injustice and slander that is exposed

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother or sister

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the death of a brother or sister in a dream. It is known that the life of this world ends with death, as it is the cup that all men swallow, just as a man dies by cutting off his breath from his body. Thus his journey in the world ends and he moves to a new stage. It is not limited to a specific age group or category. Every human being has an end, whether he believes in death and resurrection or not, as people differ in their acceptance of the reality of death, and the interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother or sister in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother or sister by Ibn SirinDeath is the exit of the human soul, which we do not know what it is, but it is what gives Life is for living beings, and with the exit of the soul, the person becomes like a lifeless corpse, where the soul emerges and ascends. To his Creator, as the three monotheistic religions emphasize the existence of death. The death of a brother symbolizes the dreamer’s salvation from his enemies and those against whom evil conspires. Seeing the death of one of his brothers who is sick indicates that he will recover from his illness in the near future. This vision shows the death of the enemies lurking in the life of the dreamer. Witnessing the death of a brother and people attacking the funeral is evidence that someone is trying to harm the visionary. Crying over the death of a brother indicates a tremendous future for the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of a dream about peaches or peaches in a dream and its interpretations. A dream about death. A brother gets married. There is what is called clinical death in medicine, which is the cessation of breathing. In humans, blood flow in the blood vessels is interrupted, leading to loss of consciousness. Stored and may be lost. Seeing the death of her brother symbolizes hearing good news soon. The death of her brother indicates her closeness to God and her repentance for sins and transgressions. This vision for a married woman is good for her upcoming pregnancy, God willing. Watching her brother die while he is alive is evidence of her prosperity and freedom from debts. In fact, the death of her deceased brother heralds the return of a family member who was absent from her. Seeing the death of a brother. Death rituals vary from one country to another according to different religious beliefs. Muslims follow the principle of honoring the dead by burying them, washing the dead, praying for them, and burying them according to God’s command. In India, the body is burned and the ashes are disposed of by throwing them away. Seeing the death of her brother indicates that she will soon recover from her illness. The death of her older brother also symbolizes that she will be exposed to many problems. Kissing her dead brother is evidence of an incurable illness. The death of an unmarried brother in an accident heralds her marriage From someone she loves. Her crying over the death of her older brother portends her engagement and the failure of that engagement in the future. See also: Interpretation of a journey on foot in a dream by the most famous interpretation scholars. Explanation of the death of a brother-in-law in a dream. There is no doubt that the faithful servant who believes in destiny and destiny knows that death is nothing but A test from God and that death is inevitable, so he fears God and does not commit sins and disobedience out of fear of Him and desire for good reward. The other side. A dream about the death of a dead brother indicates that he is being deceived and deceived. The death of a murdered brother symbolizes his betrayal by those close to him. This vision also suggests the loneliness of the murdered brother and his intense need for the dreamer’s sympathy and love. The interpretation of the death of the brother who is killed is an indication

title: Interpretation of a dream about clay according to Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about clay in a dream: clayInterpretation of dreams: Clay in a dreamIt indicates the positive energy present within the dreamer. Dreaming of clay and mud in a dream indicates the effort made to achieve goals. If a person sees in a dream that he is walking on mud, this indicates the intense sadness that he suffers from. Interpretation of a dream Clay in one dream: An unmarried girl’s dream of falling into the mud indicates salvation from trouble, if she can get out of it safely. Also, the dream of falling into the mud and getting out of it quickly indicates recovery from illness. Interpretation of a dream about mud in a dream for a married woman: A married woman dreams of seeing her children They play in the mud, as this indicates the goodness that you will obtain. However, if a married woman emerges from the mud in a dream, this indicates the death of worries and problems. Dreaming of mud with rain, this indicates the achievement of goals and aspirations. Interpretation of a dream of mud in a pregnant woman’s dream: A pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she walks with difficulty in Mud indicates the approaching date of childbirth. As for a pregnant woman who walks easily in mud in a dream, this is an indication of easy childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about mud for a man: A man dreams in a dream that he is getting rid of himself. Applause, this indicates the end of all the problems that fall under it. But if the sick person sees in a dream That he gets rid of the mud, this is good news for recovery. If a man dreams that he is walking in the mud in a dream and he is happy with it, this indicates that he has committed many sins. If a person dreams that he is carrying mud in his hand, this indicates the problems that he will face soon. Add the dream Which you would like to explain by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.
